alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 3:24AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and northeast and northwest Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most intense snowfall rates will occur early this morning through midday before weakening this afternoon..
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
